card.name: Acolyte's Reward
card.property: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is your devotion to white. If damage is prevented this way, Acolyte's Reward deals that much damage to target creature or player. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Akroan Phalanx
card.property: Vigilance {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shields up, spears out, heels set, hearts firm.

card.name: Akroan Skyguard
card.property: Flying Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Skyguard, put a +1/+1 counter on Akroan Skyguard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust me. When you have earned a god's favor, you'll know."

card.name: Archetype of Courage
card.property: Creatures you control have first strike. Creatures your opponents control lose first strike and can't have or gain first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my experience that soldiers most fervently follow generals who lead by example."—Elspeth

card.name: Brimaz, King of Oreskos
card.property: Vigilance Whenever Brimaz, King of Oreskos attacks, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance that's attacking. Whenever Brimaz blocks a creature, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance that's blocking that creature.

card.name: Dawn to Dusk
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The numbers of Nyxborn among us have swelled. Is this a sign of the gods' favor, or does it portend something else?"

card.name: Eidolon of Countless Battles
card.property: Bestow {2}{W}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Eidolon of Countless Battles and enchanted creature each get +1/+1 for each creature you control and +1/+1 for each Aura you control.

card.name: Elite Skirmisher
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Elite Skirmisher, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some adopted the tactics of the leonin to combat the ferocity of the minotaurs.

card.name: Ephara's Radiance
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Civilization is the sum of Ephara's gifts."—Olexa of the Twelve

card.name: Excoriate
card.property: Exile target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon had flown past the reach of Erebos's whip but not the point of the sun god's spear.

card.name: Fated Retribution
card.property: Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Ghostblade Eidolon
card.property: Bestow {5}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike.

card.name: Glimpse the Sun God
card.property: Tap X target creatures. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better to be beneath Heliod's notice than beneath his heel.

card.name: God-Favored General
card.property: Inspired — Whenever God-Favored General becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, create two 1/1 white Soldier enchantment creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Someone had to be first to attack, but he was not alone for long.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The great hart stood like a statue, its hide painted gold by the dawn. The Champion laid down her weapons and stepped forward within an arm's length of the beast. The hart, sacred to Heliod and bathed in the god's own light, bowed to the Champion, marking her as the Chosen of the Sun God.—The Theriad

card.name: Griffin Dreamfinder
card.property: Flying When Griffin Dreamfinder enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some griffins are able to pluck mystic auras from the Aether that are hidden from other mortals.

card.name: Hero of Iroas
card.property: Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Iroas, put a +1/+1 counter on Hero of Iroas.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My left has felled a cyclops. My right has slain a giant. I bring both to every fight."

card.name: Hold at Bay
card.property: Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was Daeron's bravery that brought him to Odunos. But it was the magic of Meletis that brought him home.

card.name: Loyal Pegasus
card.property: Flying Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground."—Hypatia of the Winged Horse

card.name: Mortal's Ardor
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such deeds should be common fare for such as us."—Anax, king of Akros

card.name: Nyxborn Shieldmate
card.property: Bestow {2}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Meletis, the walls have ears. In Akros, they have blades.

card.name: Oreskos Sun Guide
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Oreskos Sun Guide becomes untapped, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the humans have their pantheon. We need no gods to thrive. Even a mortal such as I can capture a part of the sun's power."

card.name: Ornitharch
card.property: Flying Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Ornitharch enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Plea for Guidance
card.property: Search your library for up to two enchantment cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Theros, the dove is a symbol not of peace but of discovery. Quick wings herald the arrival of a revelation.

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the gods will look at mortals and shudder."—Uremides the philosopher

card.name: Silent Sentinel
card.property: Flying Whenever Silent Sentinel attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It serves a justice higher than the whims of the gods.

card.name: Spirit of the Labyrinth
card.property: Each player can't draw more than one card each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Students at the Dekatia Academy learn that being sent to study with her is a lesson in itself.

card.name: Sunbond
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was not chosen for my faith in the gods. Sometimes the gods must put their faith in us."—Elspeth

card.name: Vanguard of Brimaz
card.property: Vigilance Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Vanguard of Brimaz, create a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The humans and their gods never blessed me. Only the pride deserves my allegiance."

card.name: Aerie Worshippers
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Aerie Worshippers becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They can conjure stars from a clear sky.

card.name: Arbiter of the Ideal
card.property: Flying Inspired — Whenever Arbiter of the Ideal becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact, creature, or land card, you may put it onto the battlefield with a manifestation counter on it. That permanent is an enchantment in addition to its other types.

card.name: Archetype of Imagination
card.property: Creatures you control have flying. Creatures your opponents control lose flying and can't have or gain flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it not the embodiment of our aspirations?"—Prokopios, astronomer of Meletis

card.name: Chorus of the Tides
card.property: Flying Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Chorus of the Tides, scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Crypsis
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from creatures your opponents control until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tritons borrow the camouflage of their oceanic prey to become predators on land.

card.name: Deepwater Hypnotist
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Deepwater Hypnotist becomes untapped, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch the waves too long, and you may never look away."—Meletian proverb

card.name: Divination
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ask of Keranos that you may understand the stars that mark your destiny. Implore Erebos that you may accept the fate thus divulged."

card.name: Eternity Snare
card.property: Enchant creature When Eternity Snare enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Evanescent Intellect
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mind is a vessel that may be emptied like any other.

card.name: Fated Infatuation
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Flitterstep Eidolon
card.property: Bestow {5}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flitterstep Eidolon can't be blocked. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Floodtide Serpent
card.property: Floodtide Serpent can't attack unless you return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pray to Thassa for what? A bigger monster to eat it? A wave that can wash it away? What then?"—Lindos, merchant of Meletis

card.name: Kraken of the Straits
card.property: Creatures with power less than the number of Islands you control can't block Kraken of the Straits.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thassa felt no need to punish the sailors for their folly in crossing the straits. The kraken would do it for her.

card.name: Meletis Astronomer
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Meletis Astronomer, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Mindreaver
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Mindreaver, exile the top three cards of target player's library. {U}{U}, Sacrifice Mindreaver: Counter target spell with the same name as a card exiled with Mindreaver.

card.name: Nullify
card.property: Counter target creature or Aura spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who incur Thassa's anger will be swallowed whole by her waves, or torn asunder by her bident."—Thrasios, triton hero

card.name: Nyxborn Triton
card.property: Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is Thassa's. I could not sway him."—Kiora

card.name: Oracle's Insight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then draw a card." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Perplexing Chimera
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may exchange control of Perplexing Chimera and that spell. If you do, you may choose new targets for the spell. (If the spell becomes a permanent, you control that permanent.)

card.name: Retraction Helix
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the Aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

card.name: Siren of the Fanged Coast
card.property: Flying Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Siren of the Fanged Coast enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, gain control of target creature.

card.name: Sphinx's Disciple
card.property: Flying Inspired — Whenever Sphinx's Disciple becomes untapped, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few dare to brave the Dakra Isles. Those who return are forever changed.

card.name: Stratus Walk
card.property: Enchant creature When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Sudden Storm
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter how big and strong you are, the sea is bigger and stronger.

card.name: Thassa's Rebuff
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To resist Thassa is to deny the rising tide.

card.name: Tromokratis
card.property: Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking. Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)

card.name: Vortex Elemental
card.property: {U}: Put Vortex Elemental and each creature blocking or blocked by it on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries. {3}{U}{U}: Target creature blocks Vortex Elemental this turn if able.

card.name: Whelming Wave
card.property: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can see why this appeals to Thassa."—Kiora

card.name: Archetype of Finality
card.property: Creatures you control have deathtouch. Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She sees mortals not as they wish to be, but as what they will become.

card.name: Ashiok's Adept
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Ashiok's Adept, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every nightmare is a caged bird that yearns to be set free."—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

card.name: Asphyxiate
card.property: Destroy target untapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some poisons enter through the blood. Some are ingested. Some are inhaled. All ways through which mortals draw strength are paths for poison."—Agathe, priest of Pharika

card.name: Bile Blight
card.property: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not an arrow loosed, javelin thrown, nor sword raised. None were needed.

card.name: Black Oak of Odunos
card.property: Defender {B}, Tap another untapped creature you control: Black Oak of Odunos gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phenax promised the newly dead souls they would be spared from Erebos. In this, he did not lie.

card.name: Champion of Stray Souls
Claim of Erebos
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Priests of Erebos give an occasional reminder to mortals who have forgotten their mortality.

card.name: Drown in Sorrow
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."—Perisophia the philosopher

card.name: Eater of Hope
card.property: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope. {2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .

card.name: Eye Gouge
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If it's a Cyclops, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One chance. One throw. One perfect hit.

card.name: Fate Unraveler
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Fate Unraveler deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never forget that the life you've built can be undone by a single loose thread."—Perisophia the philosopher

card.name: Fated Return
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains indestructible. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Felhide Brawler
card.property: Felhide Brawler can't block unless you control another Minotaur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burial rites among the Felhide minotaurs involve devouring those who fell in battle, to remove their shame from memory and to fuel the survivors' revenge.

card.name: Forlorn Pseudamma
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Inspired — Whenever Forlorn Pseudamma becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie enchantment creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More children taken. This is an evil we will track without mercy."—Anthousa of Setessa

card.name: Forsaken Drifters
card.property: When Forsaken Drifters dies, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a terrible thing when the path of the Returned leads them back to the Underworld.

card.name: Gild
card.property: Exile target creature. Create a colorless artifact token named Gold. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merchants of the Underworld trade in coins of clay. Gold serves another purpose.

card.name: Grisly Transformation
card.property: Enchant creature When Grisly Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Herald of Torment
card.property: Bestow {3}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.

card.name: Marshmist Titan
card.property: Marshmist Titan costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A favorite of Erebos, for it has sent many to the Underworld.

card.name: Necrobite
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A servant of Pharika must know countless balms that heal and soothe—and countless more that do the opposite.

card.name: Nyxborn Eidolon
card.property: Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A body Returned, a soul still lost.

card.name: Odunos River Trawler
card.property: When Odunos River Trawler enters the battlefield, return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {W}, Sacrifice Odunos River Trawler: Return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Pain Seer
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Pain Seer becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every twitching nerve and pulsing vein carries a message, discernible with the right tools.

card.name: Sanguimancy
card.property: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

card.name: Servant of Tymaret
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Servant of Tymaret becomes untapped, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. {2}{B}: Regenerate Servant of Tymaret.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is most precious to those who have already lost it.

card.name: Shrike Harpy
card.property: Flying Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Shrike Harpy enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Spiteful Returned
card.property: Bestow {3}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Whenever Spiteful Returned or enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 2 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

card.name: Warchanter of Mogis
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Warchanter of Mogis becomes untapped, target creature you control gains intimidate until end of turn. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Weight of the Underworld
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

card.name: Akroan Conscriptor
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Conscriptor, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Archetype of Aggression
card.property: Creatures you control have trample. Creatures your opponents control lose trample and can't have or gain trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did Purphoros bless Maikal because of his rage? Or did Maikal's rage blossom after he'd been blessed? Only the gods know."—Eocles, oracle of Purphoros

card.name: Bolt of Keranos
card.property: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The breakthroughs granted by Keranos, god of epiphany, can be surprisingly literal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion armed herself to face the cyclops, heedless of her companions' despair."How will you defeat it with only one spear?" asked young Althemone.The Champion raised her weapon. "It has but one eye."—The Theriad

card.name: Epiphany Storm
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Meletis, certain oracles are trained to be divine lightning rods, receiving countless visions in an instant.

card.name: Everflame Eidolon
card.property: Bestow {2}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) {R}: Everflame Eidolon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If it's an Aura, enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn instead. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

card.name: Fall of the Hammer
card.property: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is unwise to insult the god of the forge. It is also unwise to stand near anyone else who has insulted him.

card.name: Fated Conflagration
card.property: Fated Conflagration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Fearsome Temper
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{2}{R}: Target creature can't block this creature this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros is god of creation and destruction, which makes him the most creatively destructive god in the pantheon.

card.name: Felhide Spiritbinder
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Felhide Spiritbinder becomes untapped, you may pay {1}{R}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of another target creature, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Flame-Wreathed Phoenix
card.property: Flying Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Flame-Wreathed Phoenix enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand."

card.name: Forgestoker Dragon
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Forgestoker Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this combat. Activate this ability only if Forgestoker Dragon is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Akroans fashion their helms to honor the dragons, not to protect against them, as that would be of little help.

card.name: Impetuous Sunchaser
card.property: Flying, haste Impetuous Sunchaser attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will soar higher than the walls of Akros! Higher than the clouds! Higher than Heliod himself!"

card.name: Kragma Butcher
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Kragma Butcher becomes untapped, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Minotaurs go into battle hungry. The first sight of their enemies' blood sends them into a flesh-eating rage.

card.name: Lightning Volley
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the motes of rain that join to make the thundercloud. The power of the storm god surges through us!"

card.name: Nyxborn Rollicker
card.property: Bestow {1}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

card.name: Oracle of Bones
card.property: Haste Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Oracle of Bones enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Pharagax Giant
card.property: Tribute 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put two +1/+1 counters on it.) When Pharagax Giant enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, Pharagax Giant deals 5 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Pinnacle of Rage
card.property: Pinnacle of Rage deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mount Sulano erupted not in magma but in anger.

card.name: Reckless Reveler
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Reckless Reveler: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods of Theros are born of the expectations and beliefs of mortals. If I have found godhood, what does that say about their true desires?"—Xenagos, god of revels

card.name: Rise to the Challenge
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plidius wagered that Arissa couldn't kill a chimera with her javelins alone. She proved him wrong in a way everyone could see for days to come.

card.name: Satyr Firedancer
card.property: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to an opponent, Satyr Firedancer deals that much damage to target creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His heart, the coal; his eye, the spark; his hand, the whirling flame.

card.name: Satyr Nyx-Smith
card.property: Haste Inspired — Whenever Satyr Nyx-Smith becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, create a 3/1 red Elemental enchantment creature token with haste.

card.name: Scouring Sands
card.property: Scouring Sands deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Purphoros cleans the ashes from his forge, entire cities vanish.

card.name: Searing Blood
card.property: Searing Blood deals 2 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, Searing Blood deals 3 damage to the creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Purphoros's blessing: sometimes a boon, sometimes a bane. Always ablaze.

card.name: Stormcaller of Keranos
card.property: Haste {1}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A prayer answered by Keranos is clear for all to witness.

card.name: Thunder Brute
card.property: Trample Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Thunder Brute enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Thunderous Might
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

card.name: Whims of the Fates
card.property: Starting with you, each player separates all permanents he or she controls into three piles. Then each player chooses one of his or her piles at random and sacrifices those permanents. (Piles can be empty.)

card.name: Archetype of Endurance
card.property: Creatures you control have hexproof. Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and can't have or gain hexproof.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its fearsome stature, it is as elusive as a shadow, circling round to stalk those who presume to hunt it.

card.name: Aspect of Hydra
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

card.name: Charging Badger
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the hierarchies of nature were determined by ferocity alone, the badger would be lord of the beasts."—Anthousa of Setessa

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Culling Mark
card.property: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunt without Nylea's leave and you may find yourself the next quarry.

card.name: Fated Intervention
card.property: Create two 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature tokens. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Graverobber Spider
card.property: Reach {3}{B}: Graverobber Spider gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cloaks woven from its webs are durable and waterproof but said to bring on nightmares.

card.name: Hero of Leina Tower
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Leina Tower, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on Hero of Leina Tower.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot achieve greatness if its seed has not already been planted in your heart."

card.name: Hunter's Prowess
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

card.name: Karametra's Favor
card.property: Enchant creature When Karametra's Favor enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harvest god's cornucopia contains the fruits of the fields, the forest, and beyond.

card.name: Mischief and Mayhem
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The false god Xenagos treats the whole world as his rollick site. If his whims are left unchecked, Theros will be reduced to rubble and ashes."—Elspeth

card.name: Mortal's Resolve
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Fates tried to cut her string but found the thread had turned to iron.

card.name: Nessian Demolok
card.property: Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Nessian Demolok enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Nessian Wilds Ravager
card.property: Tribute 6 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put six +1/+1 counters on it.) When Nessian Wilds Ravager enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may have Nessian Wilds Ravager fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Noble Quarry
card.property: Bestow {5}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) All creatures able to block Noble Quarry or enchanted creature do so. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

card.name: Nyxborn Wolf
card.property: Bestow {4}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

card.name: Peregrination
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Shuffle your library, then scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Pheres-Band Raiders
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Pheres-Band Raiders becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, create a 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who can deny the call to battle when it sings in our blood?"

card.name: Pheres-Band Tromper
card.property: Inspired — Whenever Pheres-Band Tromper becomes untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trompers are the most feared warriors of the Pheres Band. Anger is their lifeblood. It sustains them and gives them purpose.

card.name: Raised by Wolves
card.property: Enchant creature When Raised by Wolves enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Wolf you control.

card.name: Satyr Wayfinder
card.property: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

card.name: Scourge of Skola Vale
card.property: Trample Scourge of Skola Vale enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Scourge of Skola Vale equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Setessan Oathsworn
card.property: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Oathsworn, put two +1/+1 counters on Setessan Oathsworn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Setessa is not the city of my birth, but it is the place I fight for, and the place I'm willing to die for. Does that not make it my home?"

card.name: Setessan Starbreaker
card.property: When Setessan Starbreaker enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Aura.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says you cannot touch the stars?"

card.name: Skyreaping
card.property: Skyreaping deals damage to each creature with flying equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

card.name: Snake of the Golden Grove
card.property: Tribute 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put three +1/+1 counters on it.) When Snake of the Golden Grove enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fruits are best left ungathered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The girl who would become the Champion of the Sun hacked furiously at the practice dummy. At last she stopped, breathing heavily, and looked up at her instructor."So much anger," said the centaur. "I will teach you the ways of war, child. But first you must make peace with yourself."—The Theriad

card.name: Unravel the Aether
card.property: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thaumaturges of Theros have learned to weave their magic into the world around them, but it can be pulled apart strand by strand.

card.name: Chromanticore

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Bestow {2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, lifelink Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, and lifelink.

card.name: Ephara, God of the Polis
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white and blue is less than seven, Ephara isn't a creature. At the beginning of each upkeep, if you had another creature enter the battlefield under your control last turn, draw a card.

card.name: Ephara's Enlightenment
card.property: Enchant creature When Ephara's Enlightenment enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ephara's Enlightenment to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fanatic of Xenagos
card.property: Trample Tribute 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may put a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Fanatic of Xenagos enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Karametra, God of Harvests
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to green and white is less than seven, Karametra isn't a creature. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Kiora, the Crashing Wave
card.property: +1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls. −1: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn. −5: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token."

card.name: Kiora's Follower
card.property: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She may call herself Kiora but I believe she is Thassa, the embodiment of the sea and empress of the depths."

card.name: Mogis, God of Slaughter
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to black and red is less than seven, Mogis isn't a creature. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Mogis deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Phenax, God of Deception
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to blue and black is less than seven, Phenax isn't a creature. Creatures you control have "{T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is this creature's toughness."

card.name: Ragemonger
card.property: Minotaur spells you cast cost {B}{R} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a Minotaur spell with mana cost {2}{R}, it costs {2} to cast.)

card.name: Reap What Is Sown
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of the people comes from the land. And the bounty of the land comes from Karametra.

card.name: Siren of the Silent Song
card.property: Flying Inspired — Whenever Siren of the Silent Song becomes untapped, each opponent discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Xenagos, God of Revels
card.property: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red and green is less than seven, Xenagos isn't a creature. At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

card.name: Astral Cornucopia
card.property: Astral Cornucopia enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool for each charge counter on Astral Cornucopia.

card.name: Gorgon's Head
card.property: Equipped creature has deathtouch. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You slew the gorgon? Show me."—King Igalus, last words

card.name: Heroes' Podium
card.property: Each legendary creature you control gets +1/+1 for each other legendary creature you control. {X}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal a legendary creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Pillar of War
card.property: Defender As long as Pillar of War is enchanted, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just because a temple has no guards doesn't mean it's undefended.

card.name: Siren Song Lyre
card.property: Equipped creature has "{2}, {T}: Tap target creature." Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A siren once tried to steal it out of jealousy but was caught by the song of its strings.

card.name: Springleaf Drum
card.property: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The music is in the drum. I simply coax it out to be heard."

card.name: Temple of Enlightenment
card.property: Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Temple of Malice
card.property: Temple of Malice enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Malice enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Temple of Plenty
card.property: Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
